subject: Baseball
Airlines and Airplanes
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, the flamboyant Japanese pitcher the Yankees signed this off-season, put his newfound dollars to immediate use. The plane rental cost an estimated $200,000.
snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, the flamboyant Japanese pitcher the Yankees signed this off-season, put his newfound dollars to immediate use. The plane rental cost an estimated $200,000.
